5 void Plane::setFromPoints(const Point& p1, const Point& p2, const Point& p3) {
6  Point p1p2 = p2 - p1;
7  Point p1p3 = p3 - p1;
8 
9  Point cross = p1p2.cross(p1p3);
10  normal_ = cross.normalized();
11  distance_ = normal_.dot(p1);
12 }
13 
14 void Plane::setFromDistanceNormal(const Point& normal, double distance) {
15  normal_ = normal;
16  distance_ = distance;
17 }
18 
19 bool Plane::isPointInside(const Point& point) const {
20  VLOG(5) << "Plane: normal: " << normal_.transpose()
21  << " distance: " << distance_ << " point: " << point.transpose();
22  VLOG(5) << "Distance: " << point.dot(normal_) + distance_;
23  if (point.dot(normal_) >= distance_) {
24  return true;
25  }
26  return false;
27 }

29 // Set up the camera model, intrinsics and extrinsics.
30 void CameraModel::setIntrinsicsFromFocalLength(
31  const Eigen::Matrix<FloatingPoint, 2, 1>& resolution, double focal_length,
32  double min_distance, double max_distance) {
33  // Figure out FOV from the given data...
34  double horizontal_fov = 2 * std::atan(resolution.x() / (2 * focal_length));
35  double vertical_fov = 2 * std::atan(resolution.y() / (2 * focal_length));
36 
37  setIntrinsicsFromFoV(horizontal_fov, vertical_fov, min_distance,
38  max_distance);
39 }
40 
41 void CameraModel::setIntrinsicsFromFoV(double horizontal_fov,
42  double vertical_fov, double min_distance,
43  double max_distance) {
44  // Given this information, create 6 bounding planes, assuming the camera is
45  // pointing with in the positive X direction.
46  // We create the planes by calculating all the corner points and store them
47  // as corners_C_.
48  // The planes are computed once a pose is set.
49  corners_C_.clear();
50  corners_C_.reserve(8);
51 
52  // First compute the near plane.
53  double tan_half_horizontal_fov = std::tan(horizontal_fov / 2.0);
54  double tan_half_vertical_fov = std::tan(vertical_fov / 2.0);
55  corners_C_.emplace_back(Point(min_distance,
56  min_distance * tan_half_horizontal_fov,
57  min_distance * tan_half_vertical_fov));
58  corners_C_.emplace_back(Point(min_distance,
59  min_distance * tan_half_horizontal_fov,
60  -min_distance * tan_half_vertical_fov));
61  corners_C_.emplace_back(Point(min_distance,
62  -min_distance * tan_half_horizontal_fov,
63  -min_distance * tan_half_vertical_fov));
64  corners_C_.emplace_back(Point(min_distance,
65  -min_distance * tan_half_horizontal_fov,
66  min_distance * tan_half_vertical_fov));
67 
68  // Then the far plane is more or less the same.
69  corners_C_.emplace_back(Point(max_distance,
70  max_distance * tan_half_horizontal_fov,
71  max_distance * tan_half_vertical_fov));
72  corners_C_.emplace_back(Point(max_distance,
73  max_distance * tan_half_horizontal_fov,
74  -max_distance * tan_half_vertical_fov));
75  corners_C_.emplace_back(Point(max_distance,
76  -max_distance * tan_half_horizontal_fov,
77  -max_distance * tan_half_vertical_fov));
78  corners_C_.emplace_back(Point(max_distance,
79  -max_distance * tan_half_horizontal_fov,
80  max_distance * tan_half_vertical_fov));
81 
82  initialized_ = true;
83 }
84 
85 void CameraModel::setExtrinsics(const Transformation& T_C_B) { T_C_B_ = T_C_B; }
86 
87 // Get and set the current poses for the camera (should be called after
88 // the camera is properly set up).
89 Transformation CameraModel::getCameraPose() const { return T_G_C_; }
90 
91 Transformation CameraModel::getBodyPose() const { return T_G_C_ * T_C_B_; }
92 
93 void CameraModel::setCameraPose(const Transformation& cam_pose) {
94  T_G_C_ = cam_pose;
95 
96  calculateBoundingPlanes();
97 }
98 
99 void CameraModel::setBodyPose(const Transformation& body_pose) {
100  setCameraPose(body_pose * T_C_B_.inverse());
101 }
102 
103 void CameraModel::calculateBoundingPlanes() {
104  if (!initialized_) {
105  return;
106  }
107 
108  CHECK_EQ(corners_C_.size(), 8u);
109  if (bounding_planes_.empty()) {
110  bounding_planes_.resize(6);
111  }
112 
113  AlignedVector<Point> corners_G;
114  corners_G.resize(corners_C_.size());
115 
116  // Transform all the points.
117  for (size_t i = 0; i < corners_C_.size(); ++i) {
118  corners_G[i] = T_G_C_ * corners_C_[i];
119  }
120 
121  // Near plane.
122  bounding_planes_[0].setFromPoints(corners_G[0], corners_G[2], corners_G[1]);
123  VLOG(5) << "Near plane: Normal: " << bounding_planes_[0].normal().transpose()
124  << " distance: " << bounding_planes_[0].distance();
125  // Far plane.
126  bounding_planes_[1].setFromPoints(corners_G[4], corners_G[5], corners_G[6]);
127  VLOG(5) << "Far plane: Normal: " << bounding_planes_[1].normal().transpose()
128  << " distance: " << bounding_planes_[1].distance();
129 
130  // Left.
131  bounding_planes_[2].setFromPoints(corners_G[3], corners_G[6], corners_G[2]);
132  VLOG(5) << "Left plane: Normal: " << bounding_planes_[2].normal().transpose()
133  << " distance: " << bounding_planes_[2].distance();
134 
135  // Right.
136  bounding_planes_[3].setFromPoints(corners_G[0], corners_G[5], corners_G[4]);
137  VLOG(5) << "Right plane: Normal: " << bounding_planes_[3].normal().transpose()
138  << " distance: " << bounding_planes_[3].distance();
139 
140  // Top.
141  bounding_planes_[4].setFromPoints(corners_G[3], corners_G[4], corners_G[7]);
142  VLOG(5) << "Top plane: Normal: " << bounding_planes_[4].normal().transpose()
143  << " distance: " << bounding_planes_[4].distance();
144 
145  // Bottom.
146  bounding_planes_[5].setFromPoints(corners_G[2], corners_G[6], corners_G[5]);
147  VLOG(5) << "Bottom plane: Normal: "
148  << bounding_planes_[5].normal().transpose()
149  << " distance: " << bounding_planes_[5].distance();
150 
151  // Calculate AABB.
152  aabb_min_.setConstant(std::numeric_limits<double>::max());
153  aabb_max_.setConstant(std::numeric_limits<double>::lowest());
154 
155  for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
156  for (size_t j = 0; j < corners_G.size(); j++) {
157  aabb_min_(i) = std::min(aabb_min_(i), corners_G[j](i));
158  aabb_max_(i) = std::max(aabb_max_(i), corners_G[j](i));
159  }
160  }
161 
162  VLOG(5) << "AABB min:\n" << aabb_min_.transpose() << "\nAABB max:\n"
163  << aabb_max_.transpose();
164 }
165 
166 void CameraModel::getAabb(Point* aabb_min, Point* aabb_max) const {
167  *aabb_min = aabb_min_;
168  *aabb_max = aabb_max_;
169 }
170 
171 bool CameraModel::isPointInView(const Point& point) const {
172  // Skip the AABB check, assume already been done.
173  for (size_t i = 0; i < bounding_planes_.size(); i++) {
174  if (!bounding_planes_[i].isPointInside(point)) {
175  return false;
176  }
177  }
178  return true;
179 }
180 
181 void CameraModel::getBoundingLines(AlignedVector<Point>* lines) const {
182  CHECK_NOTNULL(lines);
183  lines->clear();
184  lines->reserve(24);
185 
186  // Transform the points again... This is just for visualization so we can
187  // waste a bit more time here.
188  AlignedVector<Point> corners_G;
189  // Untransformed corners are in the camera coordinate frame (corners_C_).
190  corners_G.resize(corners_C_.size());
191 
192  // Transform all the points.
193  for (size_t i = 0; i < corners_C_.size(); ++i) {
194  corners_G[i] = T_G_C_ * corners_C_[i];
195  }
196 
197  // All pairs of lines.
198  lines->push_back(corners_G[0]);
199  lines->push_back(corners_G[1]);
200 
201  lines->push_back(corners_G[1]);
202  lines->push_back(corners_G[2]);
203 
204  lines->push_back(corners_G[2]);
205  lines->push_back(corners_G[3]);
206 
207  lines->push_back(corners_G[3]);
208  lines->push_back(corners_G[0]);
209 
210  lines->push_back(corners_G[4]);
211  lines->push_back(corners_G[5]);
212 
213  lines->push_back(corners_G[5]);
214  lines->push_back(corners_G[6]);
215 
216  lines->push_back(corners_G[6]);
217  lines->push_back(corners_G[7]);
218 
219  lines->push_back(corners_G[7]);
220  lines->push_back(corners_G[4]);
221 
222  lines->push_back(corners_G[0]);
223  lines->push_back(corners_G[4]);
224 
225  lines->push_back(corners_G[1]);
226  lines->push_back(corners_G[5]);
227 
228  lines->push_back(corners_G[3]);
229  lines->push_back(corners_G[7]);
230 
231  lines->push_back(corners_G[2]);
232  lines->push_back(corners_G[6]);
233 }
234 
235 void CameraModel::getFarPlanePoints(AlignedVector<Point>* points) const {
236  CHECK_NOTNULL(points);
237  points->clear();
238  points->reserve(3);
239 
240  points->push_back(T_G_C_ * corners_C_[4]);
241  points->push_back(T_G_C_ * corners_C_[5]);
242  points->push_back(T_G_C_ * corners_C_[6]);
243 }
